name: Doctor von Wissenschäftler Strikes Again
description:
Evil doctor von Wissenschäftler strikes again! He once again built a weapon that puts whole humanity into danger! Discover what he's up to and prevent him from executing his evil master plan!

Art and sounds: Marta Głowacka
Programming and voice acting: Sebastian Krzyszkowiak (dos)

Written in C and Allegro 5

https://github.com/dos1/dwsa
